channel.title: Milestone 11 Requirements (Spring 2022) :: K-State CIS 400 Textbook
channel.description: Assignment requirements: Deploy your website to Azure Web Services Purpose: To practice deploying original web applications to Azure Web Services Assignment Details For this milestone you will be deploying your website project to Azure web services. Description Publish your website to Azure Web Services. The process is exactly like the deployment exercise. Once you have published your website, submit the URL to your now-live website. Milestone 11 Rubric This is an all-or nothing assignment.
